Welcome to swyft's documentation!
=================================

.. centered::
   **Hyper-efficient parameter inference for complex data**

The latest version of *swyft* can be found on `github <https://github.com/undark-lab/swyft>`_.
For getting started, check out our `quickstart guide <https://colab.research.google.com/github/undark-lab/swyft/blob/master/notebooks/Quickstart.ipynb>`_ on google colab.

Acknowledging
-------------
If you use *swyft* in scientific publications, please cite one or both method papers.

*Simulation-efficient marginal posterior estimation with swyft: stop wasting your precious time*, Benjamin Kurt Miller, Alex Cole, Gilles Louppe, Christoph Weniger, https://arxiv.org/abs/2011.13951

*Truncated Marginal Neural Ratio Estimation*, Benjamin Kurt Miller, Alex Cole, Patrick Forr√©, Gilles Louppe, Christoph Weniger, https://arxiv.org/abs/2107.01214
